Container.Name: manyfold
Container.Overview: Manyfold(https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/) is an open source, self-hosted web application for managing a collection of 3D models, particularly focused on 3D printing.
Container.Changes:
### 2026-01-13 - Rebase to Alpine 3.23.
### 2025-10-08 - Change key init to auto generate and persist.
### 2025-07-27 - Rebase to Alpine 3.22.
### 2025-01-12 - Rebase to Alpine 3.21.
### 2024-07-23 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Persistent storage for application configuration data.

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: Database connection URL. For sqlite use `sqlite3:/config/manyfold.sqlite3`. For postgres or mariadb use `scheme://username:password@hostname:port/db name` where `scheme` is `postgresql` or `mysql2`. Special characters in username/password must be URL encoded(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percent-encoding).

Config.Name: REDIS_URL
Config.Description: Redis/Valkey database URL in `redis://hostname:port/db number` format.

Config.Name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
Config.Description: Browser session and database encryption key. If unset a random one will be generated on init, the database is locked to this key.
